faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Sari

q1.question: What is Sari?
q1.answer: Sari is a smart sales assistant that works on WhatsApp, automatically responds to your customers' inquiries and converts conversations to complete orders.

q2.question: How does Sari work?
q2.answer: After connecting your store's WhatsApp number, Sari receives messages and responds automatically using artificial intelligence, and can create orders and send payment links.

q3.question: Does Sari support Arabic?
q3.answer: Yes, Sari is designed specifically for the Saudi market and speaks naturally in Saudi dialect.

q4.question: Can I try Sari for free?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan that allows you 100 conversations per month to try the service.

q5.question: How do I pay?
q5.answer: You can pay monthly or annually via credit cards, Apple Pay, or Mada.

q6.question: Can I cancel subscription anytime?
q6.answer: Yes, you can cancel subscription anytime without any additional fees.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about pricing

faqs.question: Can I change my plan later?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. The price difference will be calculated proportionally.

faqs.question: What happens if I exceed the conversation limit?
faqs.answer: Auto-reply will be temporarily paused until the next month, or you can upgrade to a higher plan immediately.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial period?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial for all plans without requiring a credit card.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without any additional fees. The service will continue until the end of the paid period.
